channel.title: Please help me out with this stupid "operate"
channel.description: Please if you guys could help me out with this "operate" thing. I tried evrything to remove it but i can't find how.... Please help me ! Thank you very much ! This is the problem: http://prntscr.com/2f6ot9

item.title: Please help me out with this stupid "operate"
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

You could probably just search the term “operate” in your client folder and it’d show the file that is making all items have that option. Seriously.

Read full topic
item.source: Please help me out with this stupid "operate"

item.title: Please help me out with this stupid "operate"
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

It’s done client sided, ItemDef/Class8. You should be able to figure it out from there.

Read full topic
item.source: Please help me out with this stupid "operate"

item.title: Please help me out with this stupid "operate"
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

You could loop through all of your items from the start and set option 1 to Use, then for specific items set different stuff, for example “eat” for food.

Read full topic

item.title: Please help me out with this stupid "operate"
item.dc:creator: @AliAbid AliAbid
item.description:
@AliAbid wrote:

This is client sided, go to your Class8.java or itemdef.java (Depends on what you have) and then from there, search the item and then where it says “Operate” for that item, just remove that part I guess.

Read full topic
